item.title: Python Dependency Confusion
item.description: How does dependency confusion in Python look like? Recently, Alex Birsan shocked a lot of blue teams around the world by bringing up the topic of dependency confusion.

item.title: The time when I started a bug bounty program
item.description: Dynatrace recently joined forces with Hackerone, the industry leader in external bug bounty programs.
